message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm offering it to you at $1,100,000. I believe this price reflects the significant value it will bring to your business.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective on the price. However, $950,000 undervalues the unique benefits this product offers. I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $1,025,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit concerned about the price. How about we meet at $975,000? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product at this price.

Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to stay above $1,000,000.  How about $1,010,000? This offer reflects the true value of the product and is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, Alice, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to meet you at $985,000. I think this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.
